name: Bizarre Inc
description: '''Bizarre Inc''' were an English [[techno]]/[[house music|house]] group. Formed in 1989 as a [[duet|duo]] between [[English people|English]] [[disc jockey|DJ]]s Dean Meredith and Mark "Aaron" Archer (not to be confused with the [[film producer]] of the [[Mark Archer|same name]]), they later re-formed as a [[trio (music)|trio]] consisting of Meredith, Andrew Meecham, and Carl Turner in 1990.
